original_text: But he always returned to his home at Ramah. He was a judge for the Israelite people there too. He built an altar in Ramah to worship the Lord there.
korean_text: 라마로 돌아왔으니 이는 거기에 자기 집이 있음이니라 거기서도 이스라엘을 다스렸으며 또 거기에 여호와를 위하여 제단을 쌓았더라

sentences.original_text: But he always returned to his home at Ramah.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 항상 라마에 있는 자기 집으로 돌아갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: He was a judge for the Israelite people there too.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그곳에서도 이스라엘 백성을 위한 재판관이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He built an altar in Ramah
